name: pnp-sp-dev-spfx-web-parts-react-videolibrary
title: Video Library
shortDescription: A set of 3 SPFX webparts that use different open-source carousels (react-3d-carousel, reactjs-coverface, and react-slick) to display videos stored on an Office 365 Video Channel
longDescription: A set of 3 SPFX webparts that use different open-source carousels (react-3d-carousel, reactjs-coverface, and react-slick) to display videos stored on an Office 365 Video Channel

references.name: Build your first SharePoint client-side web part
references.description: Client-side web parts are client-side components that run in the context of a SharePoint page. Client-side web parts can be deployed to SharePoint environments that support the SharePoint Framework. You can also use modern JavaScript web frameworks, tools, and libraries to build them.
